con:call.name: ForeignExchangeRatesCalculator Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentutil:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentutil:v2_1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_1">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>?</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>?</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>?</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>?</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>?</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>?</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>?</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>?</wsc:orgid>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <wsc:orgunit>?</wsc:orgunit>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <wsc:customerid>?</wsc:customerid>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <wsc:locale>?</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>?</wsc:ip>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <wsc:item key="?" value="?"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:ForeignExchangeRatesCalculatorRequest>\r <urn:paymentAmountInput>\r <urn1:amount>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="?">\r <urn2:amount>?</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r <urn2:equivalentAmount>\r <urn2:amount currency="?">\r <urn2:amount>?</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:amount>\r <urn2:currencyOfTransfer>?</urn2:currencyOfTransfer>\r </urn2:equivalentAmount>\r </urn1:amount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <urn1:agreedExchangeRate>?</urn1:agreedExchangeRate>\r <urn1:debtorAccountCurrency>?</urn1:debtorAccountCurrency>\r </urn:paymentAmountInput>\r </urn:ForeignExchangeRatesCalculatorRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
